column4: why sometimes when i try to open a file with wine the file doesn't opens ??
is the file marked as executable?
even under permissions tab? You can also do it in cli using: chmod +x /path/to/file.exe
you can also right click the file -> open with ,then tell the OS to remember the association
its the location of the file in the OS
if the file is on  the desktop what i have to write to the command line>>>
this command (chmod +x $HOME/.Desktop/filename) doesn't work. how to go to the location download in command line (using something like cd :/ downloads)???
you said it was on the desktop. I also told you to change the filename part of the command to what the actual file is named
yes it is in download too.. The file name is Setup.exe
what do you want the tool to do?
ftp is a terminal command just like in windows
